tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ad_performance_metrics (
    ad_id INT,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance_metrics (
  ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_name VARCHAR(255),
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  budget DECIMAL(10,2),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance_metrics (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name TEXT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
)

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL,
    status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ad_clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name TEXT,
    industry TEXT,
    created_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Ads (
    ad_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ad_campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    ad_clicks INT,
    ad_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    ad_impressions INT
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    campaign_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    campaign_start_date DATE,
    campaign_end_date DATE,
    total_campaign_budget DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE AdClicks (
    click_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT NOT NULL,
    click_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    user_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE AdImpressions (
    impression_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT NOT NULL,
    impression_date DATE,
    impression_time TIME,
    user_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    clicks INT,
    impressions INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
